amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for any United Nations undertaking when it is known that the undertaking is a peacekeeping mission, will involve United States Armed Forces under the command or operational control of a foreign national, and the President's military advisors have not submitted to the President a recommendation that such involvement is in the national security interests of the United States and the President has not submitted to Congress such recommendation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record to limit U.S. military involvement in U.N. military operations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goodling amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
